definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

pinyin: jin1 qian2 bu4 neng2 mai3 lai2 xing4 fu2

definition: caring only about money and wealth
money is omnipotent (idiom)/with money, you can do anything/money talks
money is not omnipotent/money isn't everything/money can't buy you love

sentences.english: A happy family is much more important than money.
sentences.chinese: 幸福家庭比金錢更重要。

sentences.english: One of the most common problems for scientists was money.
sentences.chinese: 科學家面臨的最常見問題之一就是金錢。

sentences.english: If I want to buy a car, I have to offer enough money to get it.
sentences.chinese: 若我想買一輛車，便要支付足夠的金錢。

sentences.english: You also understand that people murder for money or power ?
sentences.chinese: 你也知道人們爲了金錢或者權利殺人嗎？

sentences.english: No man but a blockhead ever wrote except for money.
sentences.chinese: 除非是傻瓜，從未有人爲金錢以外的東西寫文章。

sentences.english: A2K: When it's a question of money, everybody is of the same religion.
sentences.chinese: 當涉及到金錢問題，每個人的信仰都是一致的。

sentences.english: If you need money, I'll be your factory of money .
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要金錢，我願做你的鑄幣廠。

sentences.english: Whith money, you can buy a book , but not knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 用金錢，你可以買得來書本，卻買不來知識。

sentences.english: Well, a job's worth having because, well, among other things, it gives you money.
sentences.chinese: 工作值得擁有是因爲，不算其他，工作給你金錢。

sentences.english: If life's a game, money is how you keep score.
sentences.chinese: 如果生命是一場遊戲，金錢就是你的算分牌。

sentences.english: Knowledge is like money: the more he gets, the more he craves .
sentences.chinese: 知識就像金錢，得到越多，渴求越多。

sentences.english: Antimicrobial active endophytes strains from Pseudolarix kaempferi Gord are potential resources for foods antiseptic.
sentences.chinese: 金錢松內生真菌抗菌活性是潛在的食品防腐抗菌資源。

sentences.english: And no, being financially and emotionally wealthy do not need to be mutually exclusive.
sentences.chinese: 但是，金錢富裕和情感富裕並非水火不容。

sentences.english: Whith money , you can see a doctor, but not good health.
sentences.chinese: 用金錢，你可以去看醫生，卻不能買來健康。

sentences.english: But money can work its way into the psyche better than Freud ever could.
sentences.chinese: 但是金錢比佛洛依德更能摸透人們的心理。

sentences.english: Assistantships are just jobs paid with money or free classes.
sentences.chinese: 研究生助教獎學金是支付金錢或者免費課程的工作。

definition: coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
counterpart/other person involved/opposite side/other side/receiving party
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
